channel.title: Minecraft for girls on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Minecraft for girls on Game6r

item.title: Craft Tetris
item.description: You are on a desert island. There is not a soul around, only bloodthirsty sharks live in coastal waters. The danger is that the water level is rising, and predators are ready to deal with you at any second. It’s good that blocks are falling from the sky, lining up on the ground in a pyramid. On them you can climb to the very top. Just look, do not fall under the boulders.
